root.name: Grand Theft Auto: London 1961
root.description: Grand Theft Auto: London 1961 is an expasion for the first Grand Theft Auto as well as Grand Theft Auto: London 1969. Set eight years earlier and with the same game engine being used, the gameplay and graphics remain the same. This pack provides new missions, 22 new vehicles and a new multiplayer deathmatch map set in Manchester.In order for this game to work you must have the original Grand Theft Auto: London 1969 game and it cannot be used with the GTA Classics Collection.
